item.title: I was going to write a column on apathy...
item.author: Alok Prasad,
item.description: Sitting at my desk, slaving over acres and acres of lecture slides, I hear the familiar two-tone emerging from my laptop. An email has arrived. I hurry to check it, eager to escape the dull monotony of work. ‘Dear Student, Please note that SOLE is open for evaluating…’ Aaargh! Delete the …
